word_mean: 又称“活动射击装置”。用于安装航空枪炮并使其在一定射界内运动和正常射击的装置。

sentence.Network_en: This ancient turret has attracted many visitors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座古老的塔楼吸引了很多游客。

sentence.Network_en: The soldier scaled the wall of the fortress by turret.

list.abs: 这种机床美国叫Turret Lathe,译作转塔车床,分滑板式(Ram type)和鞍式(Saddle type)两种。英国分别称为绞盘车床(Capstan Lathe)和转塔车床(Turret Lathe)。德文叫.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French tourete, diminutive of tour 'tower'

entry.def: A turret is a small narrow tower on top of a building or a larger tower.

entry.tran: (坦克、战舰等上的)回转炮塔，旋转枪架
entry.def: The turret on a tank or warship is the part where the guns are fixed, which can be turned in any direction.

means.word_mean: 1. a small tower extending above a building
2. a self-contained weapons platform housing guns and capable of rotation
